title: Charles and Mildred Nilon Teacher Education Scholarship Fund
description: To provide support to University of Colorado Boulder students who are pursuing teacher licensure and who are committed to advancing educational opportunities in under-resourced schools, especially those serving African American communities.
marketingContent: To provide support to University of Colorado Boulder students who are pursuing teacher licensure and who are committed to advancing educational opportunities in under-resourced schools, especially those serving African American communities.
